articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Europe frets over reduced Russia gas supplies
articles.description: Russian energy giant Gazprom began 10 days of maintenance on its Nord Stream 1 pipeline on Monday -- with Germany and other European countries watching anxiously to see if the gas supply is restored.
